description: KWGT Kustom Widget Maker is an Android app you can use to create custom widgets for your lock or launcher screen. For example, you can use Kustom to create a widget that shows the weather, date, and time and place that widget on your lock screen.

Each widget you create in Kustom is saved as a KWGT file. The JSON file a KWGT file contains describes a widget's construction and function. The asset files a KWGT file contains, such as .PNG images, are used to skin the widget.
